meanings.sent1: The insanitation in the bathroom was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The insanitation of the kitchen led to food poisoning.
meanings.sent3: Despite his efforts, the insanitation of his room seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The insanitation in the city streets painted a grim picture of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The insanitation in the restaurant was so severe that it drove away customers.

meanings.definition: The state of being unclean or unsanitary.
meanings.sent1: The insanitation of the hospital raised concerns about patient safety.
meanings.sent2: The insanitation of the public restroom was unacceptable.
meanings.sent3: The level of insanitation in the school cafeteria was surprisingly high.
meanings.sent4: The insanitation of the river was a stark reminder of environmental neglect.
meanings.sent5: The insanitation of the hotel room left a lasting impression on the guests.
